alert.note: Alert for Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:20PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Newberry and Saluda Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saluda, or 16 miles west of Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesburg-Leesville, Saluda, Prosperity, Ridge Spring, Saluda County Airport, Dreher Island State Park, Little Mountain, Monetta, Silverstreet, Ward, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Hollywood Elementary School, Emory, Delmar, Stoney Hill, Fairview Fire Station, Mid-Carolina High School, Wyses Ferry, Lake Murray Shores and Scurry Airport. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 80 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
